Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui

Class GUIUtils

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.GUIUtils
public abstract class GUIUtils extends Object
This class contains methods for getting the proper image path from an enumeration and other utility methods used in the GUI.

      Parameters:
      btn - the button
      graphic - the image view of the button
